definition: Zigui county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
Zigui county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei

sentences.english: Zigui is a new teaching practice base, where the teaching resources are rich.
sentences.chinese: 秭歸是一個新的教學實習基地，教學資源較豐富。

sentences.english: Quyuan was a well-known patriotic poet in ancient China. He was born in Zigui County of Yichang.
sentences.chinese: 屈原是中國古代著名的愛國詩人，他生在秭歸縣。

sentences.english: All collecting, we went back to Zigui County for supper.
sentences.chinese: 人到齊後，我們回到秭歸縣城喫晚餐。
